subsection_one.title: Eligibility
subsection_one.point_one: You must be at least 18 years old to register an account.
subsection_one.point_two: If you are under 18, you may use the App under the supervision of a parent or guardian who agrees to these Terms.

subsection_two.title: Account Types
subsection_two.point_one: Practitioner Account: For professionals to share contact information and services.
subsection_two.point_two: User Account: For individuals to explore and save practitioner profiles as favorites.

subsection_three.title: Account-Free Browsing
subsection_three.point_one: Users can browse the App and view practitioner profiles without creating a user account.
subsection_three.point_two: To add practitioners to favorites, a user account must be created.

subsection_four.title: Account Information
subsection_four.point_one: All information provided during registration must be accurate, complete, and updated as necessary.
subsection_four.point_two: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

subsection_five.title: Account Termination
subsection_five.point_one: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts for violation of these Terms or any misuse of the App.

subsection_one.title: Permitted Use
subsection_one.point_one: Practitioners can list accurate and lawful contact details.
subsection_one.point_two: Users can browse, search, and save practitioner profiles to favorites.

subsection_two.title: Prohibited Use
subsection_two.point_one: Impersonating others or providing false information.
subsection_two.point_two: Engaging in activities that violate local laws or infringe on the rights of others.
subsection_two.point_three: Using the App to send spam, malicious software, or inappropriate content.

subsection_three.title: Language Support
subsection_three.point_one: The App supports both English and Arabic. Users are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of information they provide in either language.

subsection_one.title: Independent Engagements
subsection_one.point_one: The App acts as a platform to connect users with practitioners and does not participate in any agreements made between users and practitioners.
subsection_one.point_two: Users and practitioners are solely responsible for resolving any disputes regarding price, job details, deadlines, or other terms of their engagements.

subsection_two.title: No Liability
subsection_two.point_one: We are not responsible for any disputes, misunderstandings, or issues that arise between users and practitioners, including but not limited to financial arrangements, quality of work, or deadlines.

subsection_one.title: User-Generated Content
subsection_one.point_one: Practitioners are responsible for the accuracy of the information they provide.
subsection_one.point_two: Users may not post or upload copyrighted material unless they own the rights or have permission.

subsection_two.title: Our Rights
subsection_two.point_one: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or is otherwise deemed inappropriate.
subsection_two.point_two: We may use non-personalized user content for promotional purposes.

subsection_three.title: Intellectual Property
subsection_three.point_one: The App and its content, including logos, designs, and trademarks, are owned by us and protected under applicable intellectual property laws.

subsection_one.title: Personal Data
subsection_one.point_one: We collect and store personal data as described in our
subsection_one.point_two: By using the App, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your data as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

subsection_two.title: Data Storage
subsection_two.point_one: Data is stored securely in compliance with local and international regulations.

subsection_three.title: Google Ads
subsection_three.point_one: The App uses Google Ads. By using the App, you agree to Google’s advertising terms.

subsection_one.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
subsection_one.point_one: The App is provided and as available. We make no guarantees about its reliability, accuracy, or functionality.

subsection_two.title: Limitation of Liability
subsection_two.point_one: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or incidental damages arising from your use of the App, including loss of data, revenue, or business opportunities.

subsection_three.title: Third-Party Links
subsection_three.point_one: The App may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of those websites.
